title: SEO & Content Marketing Platform for shylaa.ir (Persian-first, with free listing directories and content workflow)

requirements.text: Create a responsive, Persian-first (RTL) web app UI with an English option, ensuring all layouts, form controls, tables, and rich text outputs render correctly in RTL and support Persian numerals and typography.

quotes: پشتیبانی از زبان فارسی و سازگاری با فرهنگ محتوایی ایران.
طراحی واکنش‌گرا

acceptanceCriteria: App supports RTL layout for Persian and LTR for English via a language toggle.
Core screens are usable on mobile and desktop without horizontal scrolling.
Generated content views render Persian punctuation/line breaks correctly.

requirements.text: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and gate all create/update/delete actions behind authenticated sessions; unauthenticated users may browse public reference content only.

quotes: پنل مدیریت برای وبلاگ shylaa.ir.

acceptanceCriteria: A user can sign in/out with Internet Identity.
When signed out, mutation actions (create/edit/delete) are disabled and prompt sign-in.
When signed in, the user can access admin/workspace features.

requirements.text: Build the “Free Site Listing” module: maintain a curated catalog of platforms (directories/forums/social/content sharing) that allow free website submission, including category/topic, country/region, estimated SEO impact, estimated traffic potential, requirements, and a step-by-step submission guide.

quotes: شناسایی و لیست‌بندی مکان‌های معتبر داخلی و خارجی ...
دسته‌بندی بر اساس موضوع، میزان تأثیر بر سئو و ترافیک تولیدشده.
راهنمای گام‌به‌گام برای ثبت صحیح سایت در هر پلتفرم.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores platform entries with fields for category/topic, region, impact score, traffic score, and a step-by-step guide.
Frontend provides list + filters (category, region, impact/traffic) and a platform detail page.
Authenticated users can create/edit/delete platform entries; unauthenticated users can only view.

requirements.text: Add user workflow features for the Free Site Listing module: allow users to create a submission plan for shylaa.ir, track per-platform status (Not started / In progress / Submitted / Accepted / Rejected), store notes, and record submission URLs and dates.

quotes: افزایش بازدید رایگان از طریق معرفی سایت در پلت‌فرم‌های معتبر.

acceptanceCriteria: A signed-in user can mark a platform as planned and update its status over time.
Each platform tracking item supports notes and optional evidence links (e.g., profile/submission URL).
A user can see a dashboard summary (counts by status).

requirements.text: Build the “SEO Content Generator” module as a structured content workspace: accept a topic (required) and optional image upload, then produce a draft including blog article sections (intro/body/conclusion), suggested titles, meta description, and SEO tags; store all drafts with version history and export options (copy, Markdown).

quotes: قابلیت دریافت موضوع یا تصویر از کاربر و تولید خودکار محتوا شامل:
مقالات وبلاگ با ساختار اصولی (مقدمه، بدنه، نتیجه).
تولید عنوان‌های جذاب، متا دیسکریپشن و تگ‌های سئو.

acceptanceCriteria: User can create a content project from a topic and optionally attach an image file.
Generated draft persists in backend and can be reopened later.
Draft includes: structured article text, at least 5 title options, one meta description, and a list of tags.
User can export draft as Markdown and copy to clipboard.

requirements.text: Implement keyword research inputs and recommendations without relying on prohibited LLM providers: allow admins to configure one or more external REST endpoints (optional) for keyword suggestions; when not configured, provide a manual keyword entry mode with scoring and density targets for the Iranian market.

quotes: یکپارچه‌سازی با ابزارهای تحلیل کلمات کلیدی برای پیشنهاد بهترین کلیدواژه‌ها.
بهینه‌سازی محتوا با کلمات کلیدی پرجستجو در ایران و رعایت چگالی مناسب.

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can add/edit/remove keyword provider configurations (name, base URL, headers/params placeholders) or disable integrations entirely.
If a provider is configured, the UI can fetch and display keyword suggestions for a topic.
If no provider is configured (or call fails), users can enter keywords manually and set target density ranges.

requirements.text: Add an SEO analyzer for generated drafts: compute on-page checks (heading structure presence, title/meta length ranges, keyword density per keyword, internal checklist for mobile-friendly readability, approximate reading time) and output prioritized improvement suggestions.

quotes: تحلیل محتوای تولیدشده از نظر معیارهای سئو ...
پیشنهاد‌های بهبود بر اساس الگوریتم‌های گوگل.

acceptanceCriteria: Analyzer produces a score breakdown and a list of actionable suggestions for a draft.
Checks include: title length, meta description length, presence of H2/H3 structure, keyword density, and readability heuristics.
Results are stored with the draft and visible in the UI.

requirements.text: Create a lightweight “Performance Tracking” module for monitoring results: allow users to record page URLs, target keywords, and periodic metrics (visits, impressions, clicks, average position) via manual entry and CSV import/export; provide comparison charts across content items and time periods.

quotes: ارائه گزارش‌های تحلیلی از میزان بازدید و رتبه‌بندی صفحات ...
امکان مقایسه عملکرد محتواهای مختلف.

acceptanceCriteria: User can create tracked pages and associate them with generated drafts.
User can add metric snapshots manually and via CSV import; CSV export is available.
UI shows comparison views across two or more pages/drafts and a timeline chart per page.

requirements.text: Provide an “Admin panel for shylaa.ir blog” inside the app to manage platform catalog entries, content drafts, keywords, and performance tracking records, including search, filtering, and audit-friendly timestamps (created/updated).

quotes: پنل مدیریت برای وبلاگ shylaa.ir جهت مدیریت محتوا و خروجی‌های تولیدشده

acceptanceCriteria: Admin area includes sections for: Platforms, Submission Plans, Content Drafts, Keywords/Providers, Performance Tracking.
All managed records show created/updated timestamps and can be searched/filtered.
Destructive actions require a confirmation step.

requirements.text: Implement persistent storage in the single Motoko actor for all core entities (platform catalog, user submission plans/status, content drafts and versions, SEO analysis results, performance tracking snapshots, and integration configurations).

quotes: ایجاد یک پلتفرم هوشمند ...
پایش نتایج
پنل مدیریت

acceptanceCriteria: All entities are stored and remain available after canister upgrade/redeploy (using stable storage patterns).
API methods exist for CRUD operations and are authorization-aware (owner/admin checks).
Backend exposes query methods for list/filter needs used by the UI.

requirements.text: Add a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for an SEO/productivity dashboard for the Iranian market, and apply it consistently across all screens.

quotes: توسعه اپلیکیشن جامع سئو و بازاریابی محتوایی

acceptanceCriteria: Theme is applied consistently to navigation, cards, tables, forms, and charts.
Theme avoids default/unstyled template look and does not rely on blue/purple as the primary palette.
RTL styling is polished (proper alignment, icon placement, spacing).

requirements.text: Add basic in-app help content: contextual tips and a short onboarding checklist explaining how to (1) build a free listing submission plan, (2) generate a draft, (3) run SEO analysis, and (4) track performance.

quotes: راهنمای گام‌به‌گام ...
خروجی مورد انتظار ...

acceptanceCriteria: Each main module screen includes a help panel or tooltip entry points.
Onboarding checklist can be dismissed and re-opened.
Help text is available in Persian (primary) and English (secondary).

constraints: Use a single Motoko actor for all backend logic (no multi-canister backend).
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths; compose UI using existing components.
Do not use prohibited third-party authentication providers; only Internet Identity is allowed.
Do not integrate prohibited LLM providers (e.g., OpenAI/Anthropic); external REST APIs are allowed only as configurable generic endpoints supplied by the admin.
nonGoals: Automatic submission/posting to third-party platforms on behalf of the user (only guides and tracking).
Scraping/crawling external websites to discover directories automatically.
Guaranteeing Google ranking improvements or traffic outcomes.
Direct integration with Google Search Console/Analytics unless provided as a generic REST endpoint configuration by the user and feasible without violating platform limits.

required: Minimal Persian-friendly dashboard logo mark with geometric motif (logo-mark.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner illustration showing abstract charts, documents, and search icons in a warm neutral palette (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
Set of 6 monochrome module icons (directory, pencil, tag, checklist, chart, settings) in consistent stroke style (module-icons-sheet.dim_1024x1024.png)
